ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

HU_STRING_SESSION.description: Generate this value by running python3 GenerateStringSession.py locally

COMMAND_HAND_LER.description: specify command handler that should be used for the plugins

TMP_DOWNLOAD_DIRECTORY.description: This is required for the plugins involving the file system.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: get a Heroku API key from http://dashboard.heroku.com/account

OFFICIAL_UPSTREAM_REPO.description: set this to your fork link on GitHub, not setting anything is RECOMMENDED, nevertheless, keeping this in the hope that it 'might' be useful
